TopicTitle: Please report here if you're having absolutely ZERO problems with 0.20

Articles.Content:
Refer to this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/31004-Please-report-here-if-you-re-having-absolutely-ZERO-problems-with-0-20?p=385640&viewfull=1#post385640

The developers do indeed reap benefits from this thread.

In that case, good =)
No bugs here just yet. I am running an AMD A8 APU 3GHz (OC 3.4GHz), AMD Radeon HD6570, and 8GB RAM.

My plane broke up into pieces when I landed upside-down. Plz plz fix this bug.

On a serious note: I haven't encountered bugs or serious lag yet. My sytem: Pentium IV 3,0GhZ, 2 GB RAM and 8800GT Videocard.
No problems for me, and I'm only using stock parts
No issues what so ever. 30FPS stable on max settings. Can even launch 500 part ships without dropping bellow 25 fps.
Nope, no issues here either and I am finally able to run higher settings.
This thread pisses me off every time I look at it.

I have had no major bugs in my fresh .20 save.

I have had the following error from my .19 save:

1) My Mun base is underground (going to launch everything in .19 using cheats and then land my base again in .20, as nearly everything I have landed on Mun is relaunchable)

Performance:

I also can't launch ships above 500 parts without using autopilot from Mechjeb (downloaded it yesterday and it doesn't lag, even though I can't launch them myself...

This is down from 1000 parts

I'm on an Alienware 18x.

16 GB of RAM, 1 TB twin SSD's, Overclocked to 4.1 GHz.

Edited May 27, 2013 by Windchild

Bugs: None so far.

Performance: Generally good performance. Slight drop in performance when rendering atmospheres it would seem. Reducing terrain quality was necessary as well compared to previous version.

System: Windows 7 64-bit

Processor: i7-2670QM 2.2GHz

Video Card: Radeon HD 7690M

RAM: 8GB
Only one bug, and it was because of a broken mod. My launch clamps, every few seconds, would teleport back into place on my ship. Fixed it, though!

I have had no major bugs in my fresh .20 save.

I have had the following error from my .19 save:

1) My Mun base is underground (going to launch everything in .19 using cheats and then land my base again in .20, as nearly everything I have landed on Mun is relaunchable)

Performance:

I also can't launch ships above 500 parts without using autopilot from Mechjeb (downloaded it yesterday and it doesn't lag, even though I can't launch them myself...

This is down from 1000 parts

I'm on an Alienware 18x.

16 GB of RAM, 1 TB twin SSD's, Overclocked to 4.1 GHz.

Hold on, 1 TB twin SSD's? What the hell...

Hold on, 1 TB twin SSD's? What the hell...

1 TB total memory, in two SSD's of 500 GB each...

I edit HD video files (can do 3D, but my Camera can't record 3D ) and massive pictures...

This takes a lot of SSD space.

This thread pisses me off every time I look at it.

If it makes your highness happy, I will ask one of the mods to close it. Thanks for expressing your contempt. Have a nice day.

Only one bug:

-random exploding ship when using vessel with two pod...

Only one bug:

-random exploding ship when using vessel with two pod...
Closed on request of the topic starter.
